title: LISBOA font ID
content:
This looks so familiar, but I can't find it... Does anyone know the typeface used for LISBOA?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202145934im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lisboa_5284.jpg)

Thanks! Jeffrey  
 [Infraordinaire](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202145934/http:/www.infraordinaire.com/wordpress/)
author: Queneau

comments.content:
Hellenic Wide.  
(I think available from Veer.)

Thanks a lot, Jan!

greetings Jeffrey  
 [infraordinaire](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202145934/http:/www.infraordinaire.com/wordpress)
